All Classes and Interfaces

类
类
说明
Attendee
The Attendee class represents an attendee, who is a user.
AttendeeArrayAdapter
The AttendeeArrayAdapter class provides a way to adapt an ArrayList of Attendee objects to be displayed in an AdapterView.
AttendeeListActivity
The AttendeeListActivity class represents an activity that displays a list of attendees.
BottomNavigationDrawerFragment
The BottomNavigationDrawerFragment class manages the drop down menu after long clicks on a QR code.
Event
The Event class defines an event.
EventAdapter
The EventAdapter class makes the objects in eventDataList to be able to show in the view.
EventDetailsActivity
The EventDetailsAcitivty class displays details of a specific event.
MainActivity
The MainActivity class maintains the functions of the main activity.
Organizer
This is the Organizer class is for an organizer, they are a user.
QRCodeCheckInActivity
The QRCodeCheckInActivity class handles the QR code scanning.
QRCodeGeneratesPage
The QRCodeGeneratesPage class that maintains the functions in the QRCodeGeneratesPage Activity.
QRGenerator
 
SelectEventPage
The SelectEventPage class maintains the functions of SelectEventPage activity.
SendNotificationsActivity
The SendNotificationsActivity class manages the functionality to send notifications.
SplashActivity
The SplashActivity class represents the initial screen displayed when the application is launched.
StorageService
The StorageService class provides methods to interact with Firebase Firestore for storing and retrieving data.
UserProfilePage
The UserProfilePage class is for the user profile page.
UserStartScreen
The UserStartScreen class represents the screen that is displayed when a new user launches the application.
